actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require that the national program acreage for feed grains be announced not later than October 15.

summary.text: Amends the Agriculture Act of 1949 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to proclaim a national program acreage for feed grains no later than October 15 (currently November 15) of each year for crops harvested in the next succeeding calendar year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require that the national program acreage for feed grains be announced not later than October 15.
